// Path: frontend/src/admin/pages/reviews/ReviewList.jsx import { FiStar, FiCheck, FiX, FiEye } from "react-icons/fi"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function ReviewList() { // Mock data - replace with API calls const [reviews, setReviews] = useState([ { id: "rev_101", orderId: "ord_101", userId: "usr_01", userName: "Emma Johnson", productId: "prod_101", productName: "Diamond Solitaire Ring", rating: 5, review: "Absolutely beautiful! The diamond sparkles brilliantly.", status: "pending", date: "2023-06-18", }, { id: "rev_102", orderId: "ord_102", userId: "usr_02", userName: "James Smith", productId: "prod_205", productName: "Rose Gold Bracelet", rating: 4, review: "Great quality but took longer than expected to arrive.", status: "approved", date: "2023-06-15", }, ]); const handleApprove = (reviewId) => { setReviews( reviews.map((review) => review.id === reviewId ? { ...review, status: "approved" } : review ) ); }; const handleReject = (reviewId) => { setReviews( reviews.map((review) => review.id === reviewId ? { ...review, status: "rejected" } : review ) ); }; return (
{/* Header */}

{/* Reviews Table */}

ID Order User Product Rating Review Status Actions

ID: {review.userId}

{review.review}
{new Date(review.date).toLocaleDateString()}
{review.status} {review.status === "pending" && ( <> )}
Showing 1-{reviews.length} of {reviews.length} reviews
); }
